name: GET OVER IT
description:
Left and Right arrows or Pressed Mouse to MOVE

P to PAUSE

Built for the Game Makers Tool Kit Game Jam 2017 with the theme "Dual Purpose Design" in about 16 hours.

Music By SEBASTIAN PETERS

Game By ALEX JOHANSSON

Built in STENCYL

Enjoy!

P.S. If this doesn't load, the game is Flash based so: 

A Your browser is mean and is blocking it (Make sure it isn't!)

B You are trying to play the game on a phone (Play it on a computer!)
